org.nanohttpd.protocols.http.response

Class Response

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nanohttpd.protocols.http.response.Response
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class Response
extends Object
implements Closeable
    HTTP response. Return one of these from serve().

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Response(IStatus status, String mimeType, InputStream data, long totalBytes)
      Creates a fixed length response if totalBytes>=0, otherwise chunked.

      • addCookieHeader

        public void addCookieHeader(String cookie)
        Adds a cookie header to the list. Should not be called manually, this is an internal utility.

      • getCookieHeaders

        public List<String> getCookieHeaders()
        Should not be called manually. This is an internally utility for JUnit test purposes.
        Returns:
        All unloaded cookie headers.

      • addHeader

        public void addHeader(String name,
                      String value)
        Adds given line to the header.

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection(boolean close)
        Indicate to close the connection after the Response has been sent.
        Parameters:
        close - true to hint connection closing, false to let connection be closed by client.

      • isCloseConnection

        public boolean isCloseConnection()
        Returns:
        true if connection is to be closed after this Response has been sent.
